posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

Thanks for looking.  Because of the recent shipping rate increases, I'm bringing back the $1 shipping option.  Take a look below and decide which option you prefer.  These prices are within the U.S. only.

$3 - regular secure shipping in a bubble mailer with tracking

$1 - secure shipping with cardboard in regular envelope.  This method does not include tracking.  I will give you my word once I have put it in the mailbox, but I can't track it after that.  This shipping option is at your own risk.  If you trust me and the PO, this method might be best for you.
